snippet.title: Believe it or not.
snippet.description: ... It started when I was 7yrs old I remember lying on the grass at home in Wales in the UK.I could see & hear but could not move any part of my body,I can't remember how long to get over it as we all know time for a child is slow so I guess it was about 30 mins. ... Nothing ... happened for about 11 or 12 yrs.then the same thing,could see & talk but not move,over the next 30 yrs.or so it happened many times but always went away within 5 or 6 hours. ... In 1991 when I was 50 yrs.old something similar happened again but this time I was left with bad legs in fact my left leg did not work at all. ... I was living in Monte Carlo at this time & went into hospitial in Nice in the South of France. ... They were very good checked everthing out but had trouble sorting the problem out. ... I had a bit of luck which we all need, the top Neuroglists I guess in the world had a meeting in Nice,Th... ...
